direct_answer.text: After selling \( \frac{X}{3} \) vacuum cleaners during visits to the Green House (Condition 2), we can express what remains using algebra: Remaining Vacuum Cleaners = \( X - \frac{X}{3} \). This simplifies to \( \frac{2X}{3} \). Next, additional sales occurred, leading us to introduce another variable representing the extra units sold, defined by equation \( Extra Units Sold = Y + 2 \) where \( Y > 0 \) (Condition 3).
